sentence: At the 2012 Pride of Britain Awards shown on ITV on 30 October, Fry, along with Michael Caine, Elton John, Richard Branson and Simon Cowell, recited Rudyard Kipling ' s poem If - in tribute to the 2012 British Olympic and Paralympic athletes.
